description: Martin has been playing ball his whole life and bragged about how good he was…. little did we know how really good he actually was. “I’ve been swinging a bat for a few years now.” He laughed “Do you ever make it home!” “I make it on base and almost always slide into home!” By now it was clear we were no longer talking about baseball. After showing off, he headed back to the studio where he stayed hard the entire time. “I like the attention, what can I say?” When it was time to bust, Martin shot one of the thickest loads I have ever seen. It was huge!
title: Martin
